scripts.test:android:saucelabs: PLATFORM=android ENV=saucelabs npx wdio run wdio.conf.ts && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
scripts.test:ios:saucelabs: PLATFORM=ios ENV=saucelabs npx wdio run wdio.conf.ts && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
scripts.test:android:local: PLATFORM=android ENV=qa npx wdio run wdio.local.conf.ts && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
scripts.test:ios:local: PLATFORM=ios ENV=qa npx wdio run wdio.local.conf.ts && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
